channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Taylor Swift Reveals New Album Cover, Tracklist, and Release Date on Travis Kelce’s Podcast: Watch
item.description: 🌟 Taylor Swift drops album bombshell on Travis Kelce's show! 🎶🔥 Who's counting down the days?! #SwiftiesUnite #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Taylor Swift Reunites With Max Martin, Shellback for ‘The Life of a Showgirl’: ‘Best Ideas We’ve Ever Had’
item.description: Taylor Swift is back with the dream team for 'The Life of a Showgirl'! 🎶💫 Brace yourself for pure magic! ✨ #TaylorSwift #MaxMartin #Shellback

item.title: FearDorian & osquinn Announce New Album Before You Press Play: Hear The Clairo-Sampling “bags”
item.description: 🚨 New vibes alert! FearDorian & osquinn drop a fresh album teaser with a Clairo sample 🎶 Check it out now! #NewMusicAlert 🎧💥

item.title: Silvana Estrada Announces Tour, Shares New “Dime” Video: Watch
item.description: 🎶 Silvana Estrada is hitting the road! 🚗✨ Check out her stunning new music video for "Dime" now! 🎥🌟 #SilvanaEstrada #MusicNews

item.title: Oasis official fan store pop-ups coming to North America w/ stadium tour
item.description: 🎸 Oasis fanatics, get ready to shop your heart out at the coolest pop-ups on this side of the pond! Stadium tour vibes all around! 🎶 #OasisFever
